metadata.title: Impeach Trump
features: Solid colors: 100% Cotton; Heather Grey: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; All Other Heathers: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester
If you think that Trump is guilty of Obstruction, or you love snarky Government jokes, you'll love this hilarious design.

Impeach Trump is a great design for anyone who's a Never Trumper or for anyone who really doesn't like President Donald Trump. If you know someone who supports impeaching President Trump, they would appreciate this design.
Lightweight, Classic fit, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem
description: If you think that Trump is guilty of Obstruction, or you love snarky Government jokes, you'll love this hilarious design.
